Elyria.Lake Ridge Academy:
Lake Ridge Academy (LRA) is an independent, nonsectarian day school in North Ridgeville, Ohio, United States
The school was founded in 1963 and offers co-educational classes from kindergarten through grade 12. Lake Ridge Academy is the only independent private school on the west side of Cleveland. The school facilities include 83-acres of open fields, wooded areas, a pond, a creek, tennis courts, Track and field track, playing fields.
